data.title: Naples Philharmonic Chorus
data.meta_description: The 100-voice Philharmonic Chorus participates in both pops and classical concerts each season with the Naples Philharmonic orchestra.
data.text:
Auditions

Naples Philharmonic Chorus members who auditioned and were accepted into the Naples Philharmonic Chorus for the 2022-23 or 2023-24 season are invited to participate in the chorus for 2024-25 season without an additional audition.

Singers who are new to the chorus or who were members prior to the 2022 season must audition. Auditions will occur on Tuesday, September 3, 2024, between 5:10-9pm. Additional audition dates in fall 2024 will be added.

The audition process will last approximately 10 minutes and will consist of three assessments focusing on range, vocal technique and sight-reading ability. Auditionees will be led through the audition and will not need to prepare any music to sing.

To register for NPC or sign up for an audition, please fill out the form above. For additional information, please email NPChorus@artisnaples.org.
